PageDescription: Edit and co-edit documents within Mattermost
Subheader: Open, edit, and co-author office documents in your Mattermost chat using ONLYOFFICE Docs
FullyCompatibleWithDocxXlsxAndPptx: Fully compatible with docx, xlsx, and pptx
MarketplaceConnectorTitle: Designed for seamless integration with Mattermost
MarketplaceConnectorDescription: Get the ONLYOFFICE connector for Mattermost now from the <0>GitHub</0>.
WhySubheader: ONLYOFFICE Docs is a self-hosted office suite for working on text documents, spreadsheets, presentations, fillable forms and PDFs.
Reason1: Ready-to-use integration plugins and quick configuration
Reason3: Multiple editing, formatting, and styling tools
Reason5: Free Community and scalable Enterprise versions
HowToStartStep1: Deploy <0>ONLYOFFICE Docs</0> on your own server or create <1>Docs Cloud</1> account.
HowToStartStep2: Get the ONLYOFFICE connector from the <0>GitHub</0>.
HowToStartStep3: Configure the connector and enable JWT.
ReadDetailedInstructions: Read detailed instructions in the <0>Help Center</0>.
NeedAnAppToConnect: Need an app to connect ONLYOFFICE Docs to your favorite web service? Or have you developed one?
